verses.verse: To the chief Musician <WH5329> on Neginoth, <WH5058> Maschil, <WH4905> A Psalm of David, <WH1732> when the Ziphims <WH2130> came <WH935> and said <WH559> to Saul, <WH7586> Doth not <WH3808> David <WH1732> hide himself <WH5641> with <WH5973> us? Save <WH3467> me, O God, <WH430> by thy name, <WH8034> and judge <WH1777> me by thy strength. <WH1369>
Hear <WH8085> my prayer, <WH8605> O God; <WH430> give ear <WH238> to the words <WH561> of my mouth. <WH6310>

For <WH3588> strangers <WH2114> are risen up <WH6965> against <WH5921> me, and oppressors <WH6184> seek after <WH1245> my soul: <WH5315> they have not <WH3808> set <WH7760> God <WH430> before <WH5048> them. Selah. <WH5542>
Behold, <WH2009> God <WH430> is mine helper: <WH5826> the Lord <WH136> is with them that uphold <WH5564> my soul. <WH5315>
He shall reward <WH7725> evil <WH7451> unto mine enemies: <WH8324> cut them off <WH6789> in thy truth. <WH571>
I will freely <WH5071> sacrifice <WH2076> unto thee: I will praise <WH3034> thy name, <WH8034> O LORD; <WH3068> for <WH3588> it is good. <WH2896>
For <WH3588> he hath delivered <WH5337> me out of all <WH4480> <WH3605> trouble: <WH6869> and mine eye <WH5869> hath seen <WH7200> his desire upon mine enemies. <WH341>
